creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
In  package org.apache.catalina.util.xml.XmlMapper:resolveEntity it is assumed
that publicId is always non-null, it is immediately used as a key for looking
up mappings. The AElfred XML parser distributed with Saxon calls resolveEntity
also in order to provide a hook for mapping any entities, including the
XML source itself. The public id may be null in this case, this results
ultimately in a NullPointerException in Hashtable.get().
Suggested patch: enclose the main part of the resolveEntity method from
after the this.publicId=publicId; statement to the final return null;
statement in an if( publicId!=null ) {} conditional.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: The digester and Tomcat 4.1.3 have that fix already (or at least a variation of it).
Resolving as fixed based on Remy's comments.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
